dcterms:description: The dataset is the most popular benchmark for image captioning, containing 113,287 training images with five captions each, and 5k images for validation and test splits.
dcterms:title: MS-COCO

dcterms:description: The dataset is used to train object detectors, attribute classifiers, and relationship detectors, containing dense image annotations.
dcterms:title: Visual Genome (VG)
